pr_title: [CALCITE-4277] When rel has been removed from its subset, skip the origin rule match (Jiatao Tao)

timeline.message: [CALCITE-4277] Skip rule match when rel's RelSet is obsolete (Jiatao Tao)

timeline.bodyText:
Could you please explain in what scenarios does the following condition hold?
!subset.getRelList().contains(rel)
timeline.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: when we merge set, the rel may be obsolete, but the rule match is still in the rule queue. Later I'll try to contrast a ut to cover this.
replies.author: Aaaaaaron

replies.bodyText: Thanks for your feedback. When merging set, the condition should already been covered by subset.set.equivalentSet != null?
replies.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: Latter I'll debug again, we found this in our product env.
replies.author: Aaaaaaron
Aaaaaaron

replies.bodyText: @Aaaaaaron Thanks for the clarification. It would be nice if we could add a brief description in the comment.
replies.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText:
@Aaaaaaron Thanks for the clarification. It would be nice if we could add a brief description in the comment.

Updated, could you please take a look?
replies.author: Aaaaaaron

replies.bodyText:
Looks good. Thanks.
This PR seems like a positive change.
replies.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: The operation subset.getRelList().contains(rel) is with poor performance. Can you give evidence how much gains of the patch ?
replies.author: danny0405

replies.bodyText:
Hi @danny0405 , sorry for the late reply. We found this case in our product env and it been so long that I can not find the origin case 😂, I'll try again.
By the performance, we had monitor, it does not increase the planning time.
replies.author: Aaaaaaron

replies.bodyText: For the potential performance issue, how about I add a method getRelSet, the set#contains's performance should be better than list#contain
replies.author: Aaaaaaron

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the explanation, i'm fine with the change.
replies.author: danny0405

replies.bodyText: This patch results in 20-30% CPU time increase in org.apache.calcite.adapter.tpch.TpchTest#testQuery07 :(
replies.author: vlsi

timeline.message: [CALCITE-4277] When rel has been renamed, skip the origin rule match (Jiatao Tao)
[CALCITE-4277] When rel has been removed from its subset, skip the origin rule match (Jiatao Tao)
[CALCITE-4277] When rel has been removed from its subset, skip the origin rule match (Jiatao Tao)
